title: S2 Supp main - need duo
body:
Need duo that's looking to improve in each game hit me up

TheWorstBard
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=TheWorstBard

discord
https://discord.gg/xgCXF3

replies.body:
Hey in b2, but I know this is stereotypical bronze speak, but honest I've lost because of teams. for 3/4 games I will my lane, and bot always seam to lose, so now I'm going to play Draven. Draven works so well with supports like thresh, blitz, leona, BTW here's my discord. https://discord.gg/swgpRn4 
I really want to get better, and duo seams to be that way.
